price: (6) That is because Allāh is the True Reality and because He gives life to the dead and because He is over all things competent
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَأَنَّهُۥ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَأَنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-ḥaqu wa-annahu yuḥ'yī al-mawtā wa-annahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
